education.institution: GEETANJALI COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY

points: Resolved all security vulnerabilities of Smart Compliance Canada Application.
Designed and Developed Application gateway for Smart Compliance Canada which handles all the traffic coming to the application written in Asynchronous Java.
Developed services like Year End Tax Filing, ROE for Smart Compliance Canada.
Managed and Upgraded the Springboot versions and JDK versions for all the microservices for Smart Compliance Canada.
Reviewed the Designs and security vulnerabilities for Smart Compliance Canada.
Fixed critical bugs and Optimized the performance of all the microservices of Smart Compliance Canada
Developed Paygroup feature for the existing product services like wage payment, third party payments.
Worked session management for Smart Compliance Canada application
Fixed existing issues in the Core UI framework for the Smart Compliance Canada application

projectDetails: Developed and designed Smart Home Automation where we take existing appliances to online. It specifically focuses on the development of a user friendly IOT based home automation system that is able to control various components inside home via internet
System consists of mobile app which was developed in flutter where u can control the home applications through the app
Integration with Voice Assistants like Google Assistant, Alexa. Where u can control the home applications using the devices which support these voice assistants
Developed an Emotion Recognition System using YOLO3 and TensorFlow where the model can recognise different types of emotions
Designed a web interface using Django framework
Capturing the users emotions using OpenCV and sending it the model feed. This CNN model here predicts the emotions from the images and then recommends songs based on these predicted emotions
Based on these prediction user is then recommened songs on websites like YouTube, Spotify, Amazon Prime Music using their APIâ€™s
